item.title: Nicki add a quote by Frank McCourt
item.description: "He says, you have to study and learn so that you can make up your own mind about history and everything else but you canâ€™t make up an empty mind. Stock your mind, stock your mind. You might be poor, your shoes might be broken, but your mind is a palace." -- Frank McCourt

item.title: Nicki add a quote by Frances Mayes
item.description: "Where is it written that houses must be beige? Any dun colored house would look better if painted pineapple, cream, ochre, or even a smart sage." -- Frances Mayes

item.title: Nicki add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Nicki add a quote by Charles Dickens
item.description: "Every traveler has a home of his own, and he learns to appreciate it the more from his wandering." -- Charles Dickens

item.title: Nicki add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Never trust anyone who has not brought a book with them." -- Lemony Snicket
